page.title: 17A Newcomer to Ufton Village
page.content: This resident has only lived in the village for 10 months.She moved there from nearby Leamington Spa and lives in half of a large old farmhouse(Home Farm) which has been converted into 2 dwellings. She states that village people are warm and friendly but a lot older. Village clubs are not for her and she prefers Leamington Spa. She does not intend to stay in the village although she thinks it is good for the children because it is pleasant and safe. She has a car,shops in Leamington, and visits the doctor in Harbury.She complains about loneliness and says that it is more of a man's village.She would like to see the school reopened.
